item.title: The Killing Floor
item.description: The Killing Floor is the first entry in the bestselling Jack Reacher thriller series. I recently gave it a go, curious to see what makes audiences love it.

item.title: The Last Wish
item.description: I first learned about The Last Wish by watching the Netflix television adaptation. At the time, I knew that The Witcher was a popular video game, although Iâ€™d never played it.
